titles.title: Federal Hydropower Enhancement Act of 2005
Federal Hydropower Enhancement Act of 2005
To provide for a study of the potential for increasing hydroelectric power production at existing Federal facilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Federal Hydropower Enhancement Act of 2005 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, the Secretary of Energy, and the Secretary of the Army to study and report to Congress on the potential for increasing electric power production capability at federally owned or operated facilities for water regulation, storage, and conveyance.
